entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:05 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
